title: Mobile ELearning Design Tool Development for Technology-Enhanced Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and ability to use mobile devices
context.additional_context: A microlearning environment accessed via personal devices to enhance social sector job competencies for current practitioners, with project-based assessments to validate real-world applicability.

learning_goals: Learners can execute the ADDIE model-based eLearning content design process step-by-step
Learners can develop mobile-optimized microlearning modules with over 80% completion fidelity
Learners can develop at least three educational materials incorporating interactive elements based on technology-enhanced learning principles
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
